item.title: [pi] pure help command help
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
item.description:
@giveitup wrote:

problems with pure, when u type pure it gives u 275k xp in those skills and 70 hp but when u log out u can type pure again. help plz?

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pure”) && c.puremaster == 0) {
int i = 0;
c.getPA().addSkillXP((275000), 0);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((275000), 2);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((275000), 3);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((275000), 4);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((275000), 6);
c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.puremaster = 1;

Read full topic
